类 Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Writer

  • public class Writer
extends java.lang.Object
    Title : Writer.java Description: A class to handle the operations to write, delete, or modify the file. Copyright : Copyright (c) 2905-2017 All rights reserved
    版本:
    1.8
    作者:
    Group 78

    • 方法详细资料

      • deleteFile

        public boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String filmName,
                          int screenNum,
                          int startNo,
                          int day)
        A method to delete a specific file
        参数:
        filmName - film name
        screenNum - screen number
        startNo - start time turn of the film
        day - which day
        返回:
        whether the file delete successfully or not.

      • writeScreen1

        public void writeScreen1(int no,
                         java.lang.String filmName,
                         int day)
        A method to write the screen1 seat session information to file
        参数:
        no - start time turn
        filmName - film name
        day - which day of the session

      • writeScreen2

        public void writeScreen2(int no,
                         java.lang.String filmName,
                         int day)
        A method to write the screen2 seat session information to file
        参数:
        no - start time turn
        filmName - film name
        day - which day of the session

      • writeScreen3

        public void writeScreen3(int no,
                         java.lang.String filmName,
                         int day)
        A method to write the screen3 seat session information to file
        参数:
        no - start time turn
        filmName - film name
        day - which day of the session

      • writeScreenSchdule

        public void writeScreenSchdule(int screenNum,
                               int day)
        A method to write the schedule of a given screen in a specfic day.
        参数:
        screenNum - the number of screen
        day - the day of schedule

      • checkFileExist

        public boolean checkFileExist(java.lang.String name)
        A method to check whether the file exist or not
        参数:
        name - file name
        返回:
        whether the file exist or not

      • writeReport

        public void writeReport(java.util.ArrayList<Film> films,
                        int day)
        A method to write statistic report
        参数:
        films - the list of Film
        day - the day of the report

      • writeInfo

        public void writeInfo(java.lang.String name,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        A method to write a string list of information to a file
        参数:
        name - file name
        list - a string list of information

      • modifyFileName

        public void modifyFileName(java.lang.String preName,
                           java.lang.String newName)
        A method to modify the name of file
        参数:
        preName - old name
        newName - new name

      • writeScreen

        public void writeScreen(int screenNum,
                        int startNo,
                        java.lang.String filmName,
                        int day)
        A method to write the seat for the three screens.
        参数:
        screenNum - screen number
        startNo - start time flag
        filmName - film name
        day - which day of the seat
